pkgmetadata.longdescription: InfluxDB 2.0 python client library. Use this client library with InfluxDB 2.x and InfluxDB 1.8+. For connecting to InfluxDB 1.7 or earlier instances, use the dev-python/influxdb client library. It is recommended to use ciso8601 with client for parsing dates.

use.flag: Enable ciso8601 support. Faster than built-in Python datetime
Enable DataFrame support with pandas and numpy
Enable support local unit and integration tests
